x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: In most organizations, employees manually submit expense claims such as travel, accommodation, or meals for reimbursement. HR or finance teams must manually review receipts and bills against company policies — a process that is slow, inconsistent, and prone to human error. Many claims get delayed or rejected after long verification cycles, leading to employee dissatisfaction and administrative inefficiency.

x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

  • Now Assist  – To extract, analyze, and validate bill data against expense policies.
  • Document Intelligence – For reading receipts, invoices, or PDFs.
  • Virtual Agent – For conversational claim submission and instant feedback.
  • HR Service Delivery (HRSD) – For managing claim workflows and approvals.
  • Flow Designer – To automate claim routing and exception handling.
  • Service Portal – For an interactive and user-friendly claim submission interface.
  • Notifications: To provide time to time update to user

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

  • Optical Character Recognition (OCR) or Document Intelligence for extracting text and data from uploaded receipts and invoices.
  • Access to structured company expense policy data within ServiceNow for AI-based validation and compliance checks.
  • Integration with HR and Finance systems (such as HRSD or ERP tools) to route approved claims and handle settlements automatically.

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

  • Ensuring AI accuracy in reading diverse invoice formats and multi-language receipts.
  • Maintaining data security and privacy during document analysis.
  • Managing exceptions where policy interpretation requires human judgment.
  • Integrating with legacy HR or finance systems for end-to-end claim automation.
